tool_description: Validates database resource access requests against configured policies, roles, and permissions in real-time.

resource_type.description: Type of resource being accessed: table, view, procedure, function, schema

operation.description: Requested operation: select, insert, update, delete, execute, create, drop

source_ip.description: Source IP address of the request

error_messages: User not found: Specified user_id does not exist
Invalid resource type: Use one of [table, view, procedure, function, schema]
Resource not found: Specified resource does not exist
Invalid operation: Use one of [select, insert, update, delete, execute, create, drop]
Access denied: User lacks required permissions for this operation
Policy violation: Request violates active security policies
usage: Provide user_id, resource_type, resource_name, and operation. Optionally include source_ip and session_context for enhanced validation. The tool returns access decision with reasons.

risk_level.description: Risk assessment of the access request
